data.name: xMoon
data.detailed_description:
xMoon is a third-person puzzle game set on The Moon. The gameplay is about using mirrors and beam splitters to maneuver laser beams, illuminate crystals, and activate platforms. Use the platforms to access new areas, and reach the end of the level!

The game is designed to challenge the player's creative thinking and spatial reasoning skills. Each puzzle presents it's own interesting problems for the player to solve and the gameplay is kept fresh throughout. There are currently 20 puzzles to explore and several hours of unique gameplay.

data.short_description: xMoon is a third-person puzzle game set on The Moon. It's about maneuvering laser beams to illuminate crystals and activate platforms. Use the platforms to access new areas, and reach the end of the level!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB video memory, screen resolution 1920x1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB video memory, screen resolution 1920x1080
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
